phrs.translation: 沉重缓慢地走, 沉重的步伐, 沉重脚步

sentences.sentence: And plod: I go up to the stone wall.
sentences.translation: 挪动步子：我要走上石墙。

sentences.sentence: So, many people plod along through life semi-satisfied with a mediocre existence.
sentences.translation: 因此，许多人因为不满足于平庸的存在而在生活中行迈靡靡。

sentences.sentence: Or Kayak will have to plod onward, building its product and opening new markets, and waiting to see how its prospects develop.
sentences.translation: 又或者，Kayak将不得不蹒跚前进，继续开发产品和开拓新市场，听天由命。
